DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Teen Outreach Program Chicago Public Schools
DOC.detailed_description: The cluster-randomized study conduct 9th grade classroom Chicago Public Schools ( CPS ) equal number school randomize intervention comparison group two cohort year . Students administer scannable paper survey three time point : baseline , post-program 1-year post program . The primary impact analysis use intent-to-treat approach . Implementation TOP® assess conduct classroom observation . TOP® deliver variety classroom setting school year facilitator CPS partner organization .
DOC.criteria: Firsttime 9th grade student Passive parental consent student assent Inability complete survey language provide
